decision_conditions: The Council considers the amendments not to be non-material and as such, it is recommended that a S96A application for a non-material amendment be refused.
description: Non material amendment to 22/01687/CREG3 (Erection of standalone modular building comprising of 4no. classrooms, 2no. WCs, Reception, Common Room, and associated circulation, removal and replacement of existing timber pedestrian gate and external steps with new metal framed gate and new metal external steps, new access control intercom and external light, landscaping works and erection of 1.8m separating fence). Amendment to the overall footprint of the building from 8.4m x 18m to 9.7m x 18m; FFL from +7645mm to +7945mm and amendment to the eaves height from +10645mm to  +11215mm; new entrance ramps and steps added and areas of permeable paving added to comply with Condition no. 11 of App No. 22/01687/CREG3.
